match.title: 3rd Match
match.statusText: Pakistan won by 9 wickets (with 100 balls remaining)

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

image.caption: Doug Cowie - Portrait, May 2002
image.longCaption: Portrait of Doug Cowie, New Zealand 'A' panel umpire in the 2002/03 season.

stories.title: Bangladesh v Pakistan
stories.summary: At Dhaka, January 12, Pakistan won by nine wickets

stories.title: Bangladesh v Pakistan
stories.summary: At Dhaka, January 12, Pakistan won by nine wickets

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

recentMatches.title: 1st Match
recentMatches.statusText: India won by 4 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)

recentMatches.title: 1st Match
